card.name: Doctor Strange
card.property: "Have at thee!" â€” Action: Exhaust Doctor Strange and pay the cost of the top card of the [[Invocation]] deck â†’ resolve the "Special" ability on that card.
"By the Hoary Hosts of Hoggoth!"

alternate.name: Stephen Strange
alternate.property: Stephen Strange begins the game with an [[Invocation]] deck. (See insert.) Natural Talent â€” Action: Discard the top card of the [[Invocation]] deck. (Limit once per phase.)

card.name: Wong
card.property: Action: Exhaust Wong â†’ choose to either heal 1 damage from your identity or discard the top card of the [[Invocation]] deck.
"The oath I swore to protect my master overrides all other directives."

card.name: Astral Projection
card.property: Hero Action (thwart): Choose a scheme â†’ remove 3 threat from that scheme and look at the top card of the encounter deck. For each boost icon on that card, remove 1 additional threat from the chosen scheme.

card.name: Magic Blast
card.property: Hero Action (attack): Deal 5 damage to an enemy and discard the top card of your deck. If that card's printed resource has: [physical] - Stun that enemy. [energy] - Deal 2 damage to that enemy. [mental] - Confuse that enemy. [wild] - All of the above.

card.name: Master of the Mystic Arts
card.property: Hero Action: Pay the printed cost of the top card of the [[Invocation]] deck â†’ resolve its "Special" ability. Then, place it back on top of the [[Invocation]] deck faceup.
"Nothing is impossible for the Sorcerer Supreme!" -- Doctor Strange

card.name: Mystical Studies
card.property: Alter-Ego Action: Search your deck and discard pile for a Doctor Strange card and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.
"I believe observation and knowledge must precede action." -- Doctor Strange

card.name: Protective Ward
card.property: Hero Interrupt: When a treachery is revealed from the encounter deck, cancel all of its effects and discard it.
"This is one of the first spells I learned." -- Doctor Strange

card.name: Sanctum Sanctorum
card.property: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Sanctum Sanctorum â†’ shuffle a [[Spell]] card from your discard pile into your deck and draw 1 card.
"A bit ostentatious for Bleecker Street." -- Zelma Stanton

card.name: Cloak of Levitation
card.property: You gain the [[Aerial]] trait. Hero Action: Exhaust Cloak of Levitation â†’ ready Doctor Strange.
"If you're gonna call yourself 'The Sorcerer Supreme', then you really should have a flying cloak." -- Spider-Man

card.name: Magic Enhancements
card.property: Play under any player's control. Your hero gets +1 THW, +1 ATK, and +1 DEF. Forced Interrupt: When the round ends, discard Magical Enhancements.

card.name: The Eye of Agamotto
card.property: Hero Resource: Exhaust The Eye of Agamotto â†’ generate a [wild] resource.
"The Eye of Agamotto will reveal the truth." -- Doctor Strange

card.name: Brother Voodoo
card.property: Response: After Brother Voodoo enters play, search the top 5 cards of your deck for an event card and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.
"My name is Jericho Drumm. They call me Brother Voodoo."

card.name: Clea
card.property: Interrupt: When Clea is defeated, shuffle her into her owner's deck.
"I come from what you call the Dark Dimension. I don't frighten easily."

card.name: Iron Fist
card.property: Iron First enters play with 2 mystic counters on him. Response: When Iron Fist attacks an enemy, remove 1 mystic counter from him â†’ stun that enemy and deal 1 damage to it.

card.name: Desperate Defense
card.property: Hero Interrupt (defense): When your hero defends against an attack, it gets +2 DEF for that attack. If you take no damage from that attack, ready your hero.

card.name: Momentum Shift
card.property: Hero Action (attack): Heal 2 damage from your hero â†’ deal 2 damage to an enemy.
"Have a seat!" -- Colleen Wing

card.name: The Night Nurse
card.property: Uses (3 medical counters). Action: Exhaust The Night Nurse and remove 1 medical counter from her â†’ heal 1 damage from a hero and discard 1 status card from it.

card.name: Unflappable
card.property: Play under any player's control. Max 1 per player. Response: After you defend against an attack and take no damage, exhaust Unflappable â†’ draw 1 card.

card.name: Warning
card.property: Interrupt (defense): When a hero would take any amount of damage, reduce that amount by 1.
"Incoming!" -- Iron Man

card.name: The Sorcerer Supreme
card.property: Play only if you have the [[Mystic]] trait. You get +1 hand size while in hero form.
"The mantle of Sorcerer Supreme was bestowed upon me by the Ancient One." -- Stephen Strange

card.name: Crimson Bands of Cyttorak
card.property: Special: Stun an enemy and deal 7 damage to it. Place this card in the [[Invocation]] deck discard pile.
"That should hold him for a spell." -- Doctor Strange

card.name: Images of Ikonn
card.property: Special: Confuse the villain and remove 4 threat from a scheme. Place this card in the [[Invocation]] deck discard pile.
"You see only what I want you to see." -- Doctor Strange

card.name: Seven Rings of Raggadorr
card.property: Special: Give up to 3 characters each a tough status card. Place this card in the [[Invocation]] deck discard pile.
"Let the Rings of Raggadorr shield you from harm!" -- Doctor Strange

card.name: Vapors of Valtorr
card.property: Special: Choose a status card in play. Replace that status card with a different status card. Place this card in the [[Invocation]] deck discard pile.
"By the Vapors of Valtorr, be transformed!" -- Doctor Strange

card.name: Winds of Watoomb
card.property: Special: Draw 3 cards. Place this card in the [[Invocation]] deck discard pile.
"By the blessed Vishanti!" -- Doctor Strange

card.name: Skilled Strike
card.property: Interrupt: When your hero makes a basic attack, it gets +2 ATK for that attack.
"You have much to learn." -- Karnak

card.name: Foiled!
card.property: Interrupt: When a boost card is turned faceup during a scheme activation, cancel its boost icons.
"Not this time, Kingpin!" -- Spider-Man

card.name: Iron Man
card.property: Reduce the cost to play each upgrade on Iron Man by 1.
"I've got an idea for how to make this suit even better."

card.name: Physical Toll
card.property: Give to the Stephen Strange player You may flip to your alter-ego form. Choose: - Exhaust Stephen Strange â†’ remove Physical Toil from the game. - The next event you play costs 3 additional resources. Discard this obligation after you play an event.

card.name: Baron Mordo
card.property: Forced Interrupt: When Baron Mordo attacks you, discard the top card of your deck. If that card's printed resource has: [physical] - You are stunned. [energy] - Take 2 damage. [mental] - You are confused. [wild] - All of the above.

card.name: Open the Dark Dimension
card.property: When Revealed: Place the top card of the [[Invocation]] deck facedown under this scheme. When Defeated: Shuffle the [[Invocation]] card under here into the [[Invocation]] deck.

card.name: Counterspell
card.property: Attach to your hero. Forced Interrupt: When you play an event, cancel its effects and discard it. Then, discard this card.
"I should have been made Sorcerer Supreme, Strange. Not you!" -- Baron Mordo.

card.name: Thoughtcasting
card.property: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Discard a card from your hand with the highest cost. Place threat on the main scheme equal to the printed cost of that card. When Revealed (Hero): Discard a card from your hand with the highest cost. Take damage equal to the printed cost of that card.
